content.question:
​

The x axis ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1. 

The y axis ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1. 

The graph is composed of three line segments:

a segment from (negative 1 comma negative 2) to (1 comma negative 1),

a segment from (1 comma negative 1) to (2 comma 2), and

a segment from (2 comma 2) to (3 comma 3).

​The graph of the function <math alttext="y equals f open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given. Which of the following is the graph of <math alttext="y equals f to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label:
​

Both axes range from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1.

The graph is composed of three line segments:

a segment from (negative 3 comma 3) to (negative 2 comma 2),

a segment from (negative 2 comma 2) to (negative 1 comma negative 1), and

a segment from (negative 1 comma negative 1) to (1 comma negative 2).

​

Both axes range from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1.

The graph is composed of three line segments:

a segment from (negative 2 comma negative 1) to (negative 1 comma 1), 

a segment from (negative 1 comma 1) to (2 comma 2), and

a segment from (2 comma 2) to (3 comma 3).

​

Both axes range from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1.

The graph is composed of three line segments:

a segment from (negative 1 comma 2) to (1 comma 1),

a segment from (1 comma 1) to (2 comma negative 2), and

a segment from (2 comma negative 2) to (3 comma negative 3).

​

Both axes range from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1.

The graph is composed of three line segments:

a segment from (negative 3 comma negative 3) to (negative 2 comma negative 2), 

a segment from (negative 2 comma negative 2) to (negative 1 comma 1), and 

a segment from (negative 1 comma 1) to (1 comma 2).

content.answer:
​

Both axes range from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1.

The graph is composed of three line segments:

a segment from (negative 2 comma negative 1) to (negative 1 comma 1), 

a segment from (negative 1 comma 1) to (2 comma 2), and

a segment from (2 comma 2) to (3 comma 3).

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
